<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Sewer Ooze](/Monsters.aspx?ID=320)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

These amorphous masses of sewage and other detritus make their way through filthy culverts beneath cities large and small.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Ooze](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11)): DC 15

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 13

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 10
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 1">[Sewer Ooze](/Monsters.aspx?ID=320)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Mindless" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=108" />
<trait label="Ooze" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=122" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary](/Sources.aspx?ID=2) pg. 254</row>

**Perception** +3; motion sense 60 feet, no vision

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +1

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +2

**Dex** -5

**Con** +4

**Int** -5

**Wis** +0

**Cha** -5
</row>

**Motion Sense** A sewer ooze can sense nearby motion through vibration and air movement.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 8 

**Fort** +9 

**Ref** +1 

**Will** +3 

</row>

**HP** 40

**Immunities**
acid, critical hits, mental, precision, unconscious, visual

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 10 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
pseudopod +9,
**Damage** 1d6+1 bludgeoning plus 1d4 acid

**Filth Wave** <actions string="Single Action" />  **Frequency** once per minute; **Effect** The sewer ooze unleashes a wave of filth, covering all creatures within a 20-foot emanation. Each creature in the area must succeed at a DC 17 Reflex save or take 1d4 acid damage and take a -10-foot penalty to its Speeds for 1 minute (on a critical failure, the creature also falls prone). A creature can spend and Interact action to clean someone off, decreasing the Speed penalty by 5 feet with each action.

</column>
